amendment.description: An amendment No. 75 printed in House Report 114-683 to restore $1 million for the Wolf Livestock Loss Demonstration Program offset by reducing funds for EPA Environmental Programs & Management by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 75 printed in House Report 114-683 to restore $1 million for the Wolf Livestock Loss Demonstration Program offset by reducing funds for EPA Environmental Programs & Management by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Newhouse amendment (A061) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Newhouse amendment (A061) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A061) offered by Mr. Newhouse.
